Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI cannot really be trusted and only provides feedback to a certain function or aspect you have typed into (gotten it to actually do). Whereas a teacher or university lecturer providing feedback is more applicable as they have a better understanding of the task and best improvements to make if needed. It is also more trustworthy.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The university lecturer or teacher providing feedback is more reliable and feels genuine. GenAI is superficial.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Not much difference however, you can gain a lot more responses and step-by-step process on improvement and guidance from your university lecturer compared to GenAI.
